title: Kourtney Kardashian, 40, admits her tan is often fake
text:
Kourtney Kardashian always has a beachy glow to her when she steps out in Los Angeles.

But on Tuesday the 40-year-old TV vet admitted that often her tan is not real.

The siren - who has three children with Scott Disick - has come clean on her Poosh website that she adds plenty of bronzer to her face and body to stay fresh looking.

Tanned and trim: Kourtney Kardashian always has a beachy glow to her when she steps out in Los Angeles. But on Tuesday the 40-year-old TV vet admitted that often her tan is not real

On her site she said, 'With summer months long gone (minus the heatwave in Los Angeles), our golden tan from lounging in the sun (with SPF, of course) begins to fade.

'Which means it’s time to up the bronzer in an effort to prolong our sun-kissed color as long as we can.

'Bronzer truly has the power to transform your face with contouring tricks or subtle swipes on your cheekbones.'

Secrets: On her site she said, 'With summer months long gone (minus the heatwave in Los Angeles), our golden tan from lounging in the sun (with SPF, of course) begins to fade. 'Which means it’s time to up the bronzer in an effort to prolong our sun-kissed color as long as we can'

The ex of Younes Bendjima also shared two photos to Instagram where she looked freshly tan.

'Clean(ish) bronzers today on @poosh,' she said in her caption.

Her dress as by Armenian designer, Alexander Arutyunov.

You GLOW girl: The ex of Younes Bendjima also shared two photos to Instagram where she looked freshly tan. 'Clean(ish) bronzers today on @poosh,' she said in her caption

Several suggestions were also made.

'If you’re due for a new compact of the bronzing magic, we’ve gathered our picks for clean(ish) bronzers to add to your makeup routine. As we’ve said before, it all starts with slowly replacing your everyday skincare and makeup essentials to clean(er) alternatives.

'It’s unrealistic to swap out every single product to non-toxic options, but we’re all for supporting small changes that lead to a healthier lifestyle. Start the switch today with our clean(ish) bronzer picks.'

Trio: This comes after she announced that she has created a perfume with sisters Kim and Khloe. It's called the Diamonds Collection. 'I’m so excited to announce the new @kkwfragrance Diamonds Collection by Kourtney x Kim x Khloé!!!' said Kim

This comes after she announced that she has created a perfume with sisters Kim and Khloe.

It's called the Diamonds Collection.

'I’m so excited to announce the new @kkwfragrance Diamonds Collection by Kourtney x Kim x Khloé!!!' said Kim.

'This collection is really special because it’s the first fragrance collaboration I’ve done with Kourtney and Khloe for my line. Each of the fragrances really capture us individually.'

On Monday Kourt was seen in all white lingerie as she dressed up as a Victoria's Secret Angel.

In the mother-of-three's caption she noted this year she would do the opposite and dress in all black for Halloween.

Angelic: Kardashian treated her fans to a flashback photo on Monday. The 40-year-old TV vet was seen in all white as she dressed up as a Victoria's Secret Angel

Her hair was half up as she wore pretty makeup that brought out her full lips and high cheekbones.

The siren wrote in her post: 'Verified I’m wearing all black this year .'

She piqued the interest of her fans as one wrote, 'What is the outfit that you are going to wear?' and another said, 'Ok show me the one you wearing this year.'

Another follower added, 'Dammmmnnnn!'
